      • getDurationMap

        private void getDurationMap()
        setup the m_durationMap TreeMap with a mapping from GregorianCalendars to a TaskName to duration map. FIXME: We need to check that the end time of a task record is on the same day as the start time. If not, we should create one duration for the start day that ends at 12:00 AM, and another for the next day starting at 12:00AM.
